name: Smash of the Pixels BETA
description:
Smash of the Pixels! BETA Defeat friend and foe alike in the latest Beta version of our all new 2D battle arena!

Play locally with up to four players and smash each other into tiny pieces! Just plug in a controller, start the game and you're good to go!

Choose your champion from throughout the ages. Do you favour the way of the Knight? Then Sir Tommy Hawk is the man for you! Prefer the way of the Samurai? Look no further, as Samurai L Jackson will fight as your champion!

Fight in arenas around the world, from the harsh weather of the Amazon rainforest, to the ancient Chinese temples of old, guarded by the most fierce and deadly of red dragons...
